verses.verse: הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not צָבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> [Is there] not an appointed time לֶאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> to man [עַל־ כ] (עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> and אָ֑רֶץ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) וְכִימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> also like the days שָׂכִ֣יר <S%H7916><s%> of a hired יָמָֽיו׃ <S%H3117><s%> the days

כְּעֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> As a servant יִשְׁאַף־ <S%H7602><s%> earnestly desireth צֵ֑ל <S%H6738><s%> the shadow וּ֝כְשָׂכִ֗יר <S%H7916><s%> and as an hireling יְקַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6960><s%> looketh פָעֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6467><s%> for [the reward of] his work

כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> So הָנְחַ֣לְתִּי <S%H5157><s%> So am I made to possess לִ֭י יַרְחֵי־ <S%H3391><s%> months שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> of vanity וְלֵיל֥וֹת <S%H3915><s%> nights עָ֝מָ֗ל <S%H5999><s%> and wearisome מִנּוּ־ <S%H4487><s%> are appointed לִֽי׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> When שָׁכַ֗בְתִּי <S%H7901><s%> When I lie down וְאָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I say מָתַ֣י <S%H4970><s%> When אָ֭קוּם <S%H6965><s%> When shall I arise וּמִדַּד־ <S%H4059><s%> be gone עָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and the night וְשָׂבַ֖עְתִּי <S%H7646><s%> am continually נְדֻדִ֣ים <S%H5076><s%> of tossings to and fro עֲדֵי־ <S%H5704><s%> until נָֽשֶׁף׃ <S%H5399><s%> unto the dawning of the day

לָ֘בַ֤שׁ <S%H3847><s%> is clothed בְּשָׂרִ֣י <S%H1320><s%> My flesh רִ֭מָּה <S%H7415><s%> with worms [וְגִישׁ כ] (וְג֣וּשׁ <S%H1487><s%> clod ק) עָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> of dust עוֹרִ֥י <S%H5785><s%> my skin רָ֝גַ֗ע <S%H7280><s%> is broken וַיִּמָּאֵֽס׃ <S%H3988><s%> and become loathsome

יָמַ֣י <S%H3117><s%> My days קַ֭לּוּ <S%H7043><s%> are swifter מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> than אָ֑רֶג <S%H708><s%> than a weaver's shuttle וַ֝יִּכְל֗וּ <S%H3615><s%> and are spent בְּאֶ֣פֶס <S%H657><s%> without תִּקְוָֽה׃ <S%H8615><s%> hope

זְ֭כֹר <S%H2142><s%> O remember כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> [is] wind חַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> that my life לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall no more עֵ֝ינִ֗י <S%H5869><s%> mine eye לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> see טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תְ֭שׁוּרֵנִי <S%H7789><s%> me shall see עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> The eye רֹ֑אִי <S%H7210><s%> of him that hath seen עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> me no [more] thine eyes בִּ֣י וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃ <S%H369><s%> else

כָּלָ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> is consumed עָ֭נָן <S%H6051><s%> [As] the cloud וַיֵּלַ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> is gone כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So יוֹרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> so he that goeth down שְׁ֝א֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> to the grave לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַעֲלֶֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> shall come up

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> He shall return ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> no more to his house וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5234><s%> know ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore מְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> neither shall his place

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Therefore אֲנִי֮ <S%H589><s%> I לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶחֱשָׂ֫ךְ <S%H2820><s%> Therefore I will not refrain פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth אֲ‍ֽ֭דַבְּרָה <S%H1696><s%> I will speak בְּצַ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> in the anguish רוּחִ֑י <S%H7307><s%> of my spirit אָ֝שִׂ֗יחָה <S%H7878><s%> I will complain בְּמַ֣ר <S%H4751><s%> in the bitterness נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> of my soul

הֲ‍ֽיָם־ <S%H3220><s%> [Am] I a sea אָ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or תַּנִּ֑ין <S%H8577><s%> or a whale כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that תָשִׂ֖ים <S%H7760><s%> that thou settest עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> over מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> a watch

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> When I say תְּנַחֲמֵ֣נִי <S%H5162><s%> shall comfort עַרְשִׂ֑י <S%H6210><s%> My bed יִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> shall ease בְ֝שִׂיחִ֗י <S%H7878><s%> commune מִשְׁכָּבִֽי׃ <S%H4904><s%> me my couch
וְחִתַּתַּ֥נִי <S%H2865><s%> Then thou scarest בַחֲלֹמ֑וֹת <S%H2472><s%> me with dreams וּֽמֵחֶזְיֹנ֥וֹת <S%H2384><s%> me through visions תְּבַעֲתַֽנִּי׃ <S%H1204><s%> and terrifiest
וַתִּבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> chooseth מַחֲנָ֣ק <S%H4267><s%> strangling נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> So that my soul מָ֝֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> [and] death מֵֽעַצְמוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H6106><s%> rather than my life

מָ֭אַסְתִּי <S%H3988><s%> I loathe לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not לְעֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> alway אֶֽחְיֶ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> [it] I would not live חֲדַ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> let me alone מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> alone כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [are] vanity יָמָֽי׃ <S%H3117><s%> for my days

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> What [is] man כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that תְגַדְּלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H1431><s%> that thou shouldest magnify וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> should תָשִׁ֖ית <S%H7896><s%> him? and that thou shouldest set אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> about לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart
וַתִּפְקְדֶ֥נּוּ <S%H6485><s%> And [that] thou shouldest visit לִבְקָרִ֑ים <S%H1242><s%> him every morning לִ֝רְגָעִ֗ים <S%H7281><s%> instant תִּבְחָנֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H974><s%> [and] try

כַּ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> How long לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> never תִשְׁעֶ֣ה <S%H8159><s%> wilt thou not depart מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor תַ֝רְפֵּ֗נִי <S%H7503><s%> from me nor let me alone עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בִּלְעִ֥י <S%H1104><s%> till I swallow down רֻקִּֽי׃ <S%H7536><s%> spit-ting

חָטָ֡אתִי <S%H2398><s%> I have sinned מָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> have I אֶפְעַ֨ל ׀ <S%H6466><s%> what shall I do לָךְ֮ נֹצֵ֪ר <S%H5341><s%> unto thee O thou preserver הָאָ֫דָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> man לָ֤מָה <S%H4100><s%> have You שַׂמְתַּ֣נִי <S%H7760><s%> set לְמִפְגָּ֣ע <S%H4645><s%> me as a mark לָ֑ךְ וָאֶהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> I am עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and לְמַשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H4853><s%> against thee so that I am a burden

וּמֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H4100><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> And why dost thou not pardon פִשְׁעִי֮ <S%H6588><s%> my transgression וְתַעֲבִ֪יר <S%H5674><s%> and take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֫נִ֥י <S%H5771><s%> fault כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַ֭תָּה <S%H6258><s%> henceforth לֶעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> in the dust אֶשְׁכָּ֑ב <S%H7901><s%> will lie וְשִׁ֖חֲרְתַּ֣נִי <S%H7836><s%> and thou shalt seek me in the morning וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃ <S%H369><s%> else פ
